name: Fantasy Bubble Pop: Pet Shoot
description:
Amazing bubble shooter game comes!
Start your bubble saga journey! Beat all the unique bubble levels! Have fun in your own bubble blast adventure!
Fantasy Bubble Pop features:
• Very small game size
• Stunning graphics and effects
• Over 210 levels and more will come!
• 7 worlds waiting for you to go on a safari
• Various kinds of obstacles that make game more fun
• Game center to watch your score and other competitors
• Run well on all Android phones and tablets!
